title: Apple pecan cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '225g (8 oz) digestive crumbs', '65g (2 1/2 oz) melted butter', '2 tablespoons brown soft sugar', 'For the filling', '3 (300g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '225g (8 oz) brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225ml (8 fl oz) soured cream', '4 eggs', 'For the topping', '500g (1 1/4 lb) apples (about 3) - peeled, cored and chopped', '115g (4 oz) brown soft sugar', '90g (3 1/2 oz) chopped pecans', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
